title: The Depths of Hell: Survival Horror Game Music
longDescription:
The Depths of Hell features a collection of disturbing and menacing harmonic musical loops that evoke a wide range of emotions. Some tracks offer a haunting beauty with a sinister edge, while others deliver intense, gritty, metal-infused authority that heightens suspense. The world of The Depths of Hell is defined by darkness, desolation, malevolence, and mystery, creating an atmosphere of relentless terror and survival. These tracks are perfect for survival/horror games but also fit seamlessly into FPS and action/mystery games, enhancing the overall experience with their atmospheric depth and intensity.

 

Click HERE to listen to the demo.

 

Song listing:

 

01 Descent (2:40)

02 Echoes (2:28)

03 Inferno (2:40)

04 Shadows (2:38)

05 Whispers (2:40)

06 Lament (2:40)

07 Hellfire (2:40)

08 Nightmares (2:40)

09 Torment (2:40)

10 Agony (2:40)

11 Bloodstained (2:40)

12 Requiem (2:40)

 

Each song includes both a standard and looping version. Each song also includes separate intro, middle, and outro parts.

 

If you need custom music or sound effects for your game, please email us at info@ikonyksound.com.
